Title: Provides that the probationary period of a school administrator or supervisor who previously was granted tenure, shall be 2 years
Summary: Provides that the probationary period of a school principal, administrator, supervisor or any other member of a supervising staff who previously was granted tenure, shall be 2 years.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to securing for previously tenured administrators and supervisors the same probationary period as provided for teachers and all other members of the teaching staffs of school districts in the state
